pkgmetadata.longdescription: Import Data in the JCAMP-DX Format // Import data written in the JCAMP-DX format. This is an instrument-independent format used in the field of spectroscopy. Examples include IR, NMR, and Raman spectroscopy. See the vignette for background and supported formats. The official JCAMP-DX site is http://www.jcamp-dx.org/.
